method.name: create_with_waveform
method.description: Creates a track with the given [param waveform]. Sets the master volume to the following values: - [constant BlipKitTrack.WAVEFORM_SQUARE]: [code]0.15[/code] - [constant BlipKitTrack.WAVEFORM_NOISE]: [code]0.15[/code] - [constant BlipKitTrack.WAVEFORM_SAWTOOTH]: [code]0.15[/code] - [constant BlipKitTrack.WAVEFORM_TRIANGLE]: [code]0.3[/code] - [constant BlipKitTrack.WAVEFORM_SINE]: [code]0.3[/code]

members.member: Sets a custom waveform. [member BlipKitTrack.waveform] returns [method BlipKitTrack.WAVEFORM_CUSTOM] in this case. [b]Note:[/b] This fails if the track is not attached yet with [method BlipKitTrack.attach].
Sets the stereo panning between [code]-1.0[/code] and [code]+1.0[/code]. Negative values pan towards the left channel and positive values towards the right channel.
